testcase.classname: As a user/administrator, I should be able to create a new customer record in the system via API connection.
testcase.name: When a POST body containing a password with fewer than 8 characters is sent to the /api/register endpoint
testcase.system-out: * The api user creates the base url.........................................passed * The api user sets "api/register" path parameters..........................passed * The api user prepares a POST request with a password containing fewer than '8' characters to send to the api register endpoint..passed * The api user sends a POST request and saves the response from the api register endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 422.........................passed * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "The password field minimum 8 character.".passed
